idea-plugin.name: GsonFormatPlus
idea-plugin.description:
quickly to convert a JSON string to an InnerClassEntity class ..
openSource
idea-plugin.change-notes:
1.5.4

  • fix several bug
  • support json5
  • support comment

1.5.2

  • set jackson as default annotation
  • support lombok

1.5.0

  • fix several bug
  • fix unlock setting window size

1.4.x

  • New: Support for autovalue
  • New: Support for lombok
  • New: Support for split generate class
